objects.description: [Royal](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1073) can use `GetNativeSystemInfo` and `GetLogicalDrives` to enumerate system processors and logical drives.(Citation: Cybereason Royal December 2022)(Citation: Trend Micro Royal Linux ESXi February 2023)
